description: Interpret the ambiguous sentence and explain its possible meanings:

dev_examples.input: I saw the man with the telescope.
dev_examples.output: The sentence could mean that I used a telescope to see the man, or that I saw a man who was holding a telescope.
This could mean that she did not notice her duck, or that she did not see her lower her head.

eval_example.input: When Emily spoke to Laura, she was upset.
